alert.note: Alert for Mountains Southwestern Shasta County to Western Colusa County; Shasta Lake Area, Northern Shasta County (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 10 at 3:59PM PST until January 10 at 9:00PM PST by NWS Sacramento
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM PST THIS EVENING... ...WINTER STORM WARNING WILL EXPIRE AT 4 PM PST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Heavy wet snow. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 4 inches above 4000 feet. Winds gusting as high as 30 mph. * WHERE...Shasta Lake Area / Northern Shasta County and Mountains Southwestern Shasta County to Western Colusa County Counties. * WHEN...Until 9 PM PST this evening. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Winds could cause tree damage.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1. A Winter Weather Advisory means that periods of snow, sleet, or freezing rain will cause travel difficulties. Be prepared for slippery roads and limited visibilities, and use caution while driving.

area.areaDesc: Mountains Southwestern Shasta County to Western Colusa County; Shasta Lake Area, Northern Shasta County
